author: olegk
msg: HTTPCORE-77: The result of CharsetDecoder#decode() and CharsetEncoder#encode() was not checked for errors resulting in an infinite loop in SessionInputBuffer#readLine() and SessionOutputBuffer#writeLine() when malformed characters were processed.
